FilesLoading.title: Loading...
FilesLoading.text: Please wait. The files are being loaded.

FilesEmpty.title: The folder is empty.

FilterFilesEmpty.title: Nothing found.
FilterFilesEmpty.text: Please try using different search criteria.

UploadNoFolder: Please select a folder before uploading.
UploadExtIncorrect: File extension is not allowed in this folder.
ErrorUnknown: It was not possible to complete the request. (Error %1)

Errors.11: The resource type was not specified in the request.
Errors.12: The requested resource type is invalid.
Errors.13: The connector configuration file is invalid.
Errors.103: It was not possible to complete the request due to authorization restrictions.
Errors.104: It was not possible to complete the request due to file system permission restrictions.
Errors.111: It was not possible to complete the request due to resulting file size.
Errors.115: A file or folder with the same name already exists.
Errors.116: Folder not found. Please refresh and try again.
Errors.117: File not found. Please refresh the files list and try again.
Errors.118: Source and target paths are equal.
Errors.201: A file with the same name already exists. The uploaded file was renamed to "%1".
Errors.203: Invalid file. The file size is too big.
Errors.205: No temporary folder is available for upload on the server.
Errors.206: Upload canceled due to security reasons. The file contains HTML-like data.
Errors.207: The uploaded file was renamed to "%1".
Errors.500: The file browser is disabled for security reasons. Please contact your system administrator and check the CKFinder configuration file.

ErrorMsg.FileNameNotEmpty: The file name cannot be empty.
ErrorMsg.FileInvChar:
The file name cannot contain any of the following characters: 
\ / : * ? " < > |
ErrorMsg.FolderInvChar:
The folder name cannot contain any of the following characters: 
\ / : * ? " < > |
ErrorMsg.MissingFolder: The folder you are trying to reach is no longer available.
ErrorMsg.MissingFile: The requested file is no longer available.
